alert.note: Alert for Howard; Little River; Sevier (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 6:43AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Little River, Sevier, Howard and southeastern McCurtain Counties through 730 AM CDT... At 643 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Caney Creek Wilderness to 9 miles south of Idabel. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... De Queen, Dierks, Horatio, Foreman, Umpire, Lockesburg, Winthrop, Gillham, Ben Lomond, Arkinda, Center Point, Athens, Oak Grove, Haworth, Eagletown, Silver Ridge, Moon, Cerrogordo, Goodlake and Geneva. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
